trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of a row in a data control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
The DataControlRowState enumeration identifies the state of a row in a data control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

A row's state can be one or a combination of the DataControlRowState values, so use bitwise operations to determine whether the state of the row includes a DataControlRowState value, rather than an equivalence test.
The DataControlRowState enumeration is used for any type of row, not just <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> rows (typically, the state of header and footer rows is set to Normal).

You can use the DataControlRowState enumeration to identify the state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object when enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> collection, respectively.

If you are writing a data control that uses rows, you can use the DataControlRowState enumeration to identify when to render different colors for a row (the Alternate value), or controls that are enabled or disabled for editing a row (the Edit and Insert values).
Indicates that the data control row is an alternate row.
The Alternate state can be combined with other states, such as Normal, Edit, or Insert, at any time.
These rows might be affected by the `AlternateRowStyle` property of the data control, if set.
To be added.
Indicates that the row is in an edit state, often the result of clicking an edit button for the row.
Typically, the Edit and Insert states are mutually exclusive.
To be added.
Indicates that the row is a new row, often the result of clicking an insert button to add a new row.
Typically, the Insert and Edit states are mutually exclusive.
To be added.
Indicates that the data control row is in a normal state.
The Normal state is mutually exclusive with other states except the Alternate state.
To be added.
Indicates that the row has been selected by the user.
To be added.
